alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 9:31PM CDT until June 30 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LEAVENWORTH...EASTERN ATCHISON...SOUTHWESTERN BUCHANAN AND NORTHWESTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 931 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lewis And Clark Village, or 9 miles north of Weston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Atchison, Rushville, Lewis And Clark Village, De Kalb, Farmington, Iatan, Lowemont, Cummings, Potter, Bean Lake and Lewis And Clark Vi. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
